Posted By: wholelottalove (1/29/2013 7:01:38 AM)

posts.post_content:
[Swift Justice](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Swift Justice) is cheaper and much more dangerous offensively, where you're probably going to want a combat trick for a creature that's already blocked (the extra one damage doesn't seem worth it for a creature that's hitting them directly).  
  
But on the defensive when your opponent is trying to sneak a flyer past you? I can appreciate that kind of combat trick. Especially for the Gruul who aren't able to do that normally.
posts.html:
Swift Justice is cheaper and much more dangerous offensively, where you're probably going to want a combat trick for a creature that's already blocked (the extra one damage doesn't seem worth it for a creature that's hitting them directly).

But on the defensive when your opponent is trying to sneak a flyer past you? I can appreciate that kind of combat trick. Especially for the Gruul who aren't able to do that normally.
